name: Extreme Car Parking Sim 3D
description:
If you loves the parking games and 3D car simulations, then you will definitely enjoy playing this simulator game, this is Real life Car parking challenge for you. In this 3D Car Simulator game you can feel the realistic driving experience.
It requires quick reflexes and a good sense of timing.
Drive the ultimate cars quickly and safely to their designated parking spots! Steer vehicles into right direction and stop it into the tight parking area by applying the car breaks. You must control each vehicle accurately to avoid wrecking.

By follow the guiding arrow to the parking spots, you have to park the car in each marked space without getting into any accidents with obstacles. If you hit the car or crash into an obstacle, your chance of winning the level will decrease. For accuracy make use of different camera angles for car parking. In order to score all stars, you must drive absolutely perfect with precision. Prove that you're the best driver in the town!

Have fun parking! You will have limited time for parking the car, so drive fast and smooth with the good use of steering and extreme driving skills.

There are extremely wonderful 60+ levels that are very addictive and hard. To continue to the next level, drive the cars quickly and safely to park them in the correct spot!


Features:

• 60+ car parking missions
• HD graphics with a realistic environment
• Different Game levels with parking hurdles
• Free Customization of 3D cars
• Realistic Physics.
• Real car sounds and visual effects
• Smooth and Realistic Game play
• Realistic driving and parking experience
